body.section: To add the selected concept to an existing refset, click on the Add Concept Extension button, as shown in .
The default reset will appear in the refset column. Double-click this value to change to another refset. A drop-down list will display as shown in Select the desired refset.

section.title: Selecting the Concept Inclusion Type Inclusion Type

body.section: When linking a concept to a refset, its inclusion type must be specified as either exclude individual, exclude lineage, individual include or lineage include.

When the concept is first added to a refset, an inclusion type will be assigned by default (as set in the Preferences Panel). To modify this value, double-click on it in the concept column. A list of values will display as shown in . Select the desired value. Or you can right-click on the entry and select Change concept to display the pop-up list.

The default refset status is normally set as current. (Other values are defined in the Refset preferences.) To modify this value, double-click on it in the status column. A list of values will display, as shown in . Select the desired value. Or you can right-click on the entry and select Change status to display the list.

The refset associations entered are not final in the database until you click the Commit button at the bottom right of the IHTSDO IDE window. To clear the current entries (instead of committing them), click the Cancel button at the bottom right of the IHTSDO IDE window.
